Text:
this one on HANK SKINNER

this is also called ON DEATH ROW.. so not sure the cappers
got the title right but i suspect USA and UK have changed the
names and episode order yet again !!
http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-30684

Yes, the Americans have included the documentary 'The British Woman on Death Row' about Linda Carty to the series. This is not made by Herzog but by the same people that did 'Fourteen Days in May' (1988) about Earl Johnson. That is a great documentary and if you are interested in the subject you should check it out, its available here in the pirate bay. Here is a link to the Linda Carty episode:  http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6850919/The.British.Woman.On.Death.Row.PDTV.XviD-FTP

What lattari says isn't entirely true.
Herzog made 4 docs, the one on Linda Carty didn't air in the UK on Channel 4 because they had recently shown and aired their own doc, the one that lattari links to. There are in fact 2 docs about her, the Ch4 one, and the Herzog one, which is proving hard to track down...
